name: VTNutrition
tagline: Repository for VTNutrition app, listing nutrition information for VT dining halls
body:
# Not implemented yet
Pretty much everything.

# Usage
## Dining Halls tab
This tab features a table view listing all of the dining halls in the database. Simply tap one to "drill down" and get a list of the "restaurants" (if any) inside that dining hall. Tapping on one of those will give you a list of foods available there. Tap on a food to bring up a screen showing the calories.

### Food detail view
Here you can see the calories contained in the chosen food item, and either add it to your daily food list, or tap the button to see detailed nutrition information directly from VT's web sites.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
